text: Francisco Manuel Lumbrales de Sá Carneiro founded the Portuguese Social Democratic Party in 1974. He was elected Prime Minister of Portugal in January 1980. Sá Carneiro died in a plane crash in December 1980. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Portugal Category:Portuguese Roman Catholics Category:Portuguese lawyers Category:People from Porto
title: Francisco de Sá Carneiro
